Author: Flexatron#8809
Content: Is it possible to do mergetozadress from a wallet?

Author: Flexatron#8809
Content: it's not the same as just sending your stack to a new address right?

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: "a wallet"?

Author: Flexatron#8809
Content: like agama

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: in "settings" agama has a cli pass-through that lets you do the same as if running from command prompt (just leave off the `komodo-cli -ac_name=PIRATE` part)

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @Flexatron you can do z_mergetoaddress via full mode agama

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: z_mergetoaddress is just syntax sugar on top of z_sendmany, it sends transactions and costs tx fees (but you can easily set them to 0 via the CLI) :pirate:

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @Flexatron you can import a private key of a zaddr to multiple nodes as well, it's like burying the same treasure chest in multiple places. But also, somebody can dig it up and find it in multiple places....

Author: Flexatron#8809
Content: Thanks

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: cold storage of a zaddr private key is easier as well, because all change from a zaddr flows back to itself. With taddrs, your change constantly goes to a new address

Author: FishyGuts#5085
FishyGuts#5085
Content: As to the site... I do like it to.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
I think it is good to keep in mind that 90% of our "customers" are not as savvy as you all are.  
It's some what cumbersome to navigate the existing site for people who are newer to the sphere.  I handle daily DMs from people looking for info.
Ease of onboarding is critical for adopting new users.  
Think of trying to board a ship tied to a dock.... vs. catching a swim ladder while the boat is sailing by at 5 knots.
Monero pushed a gui update for all users, which had multiple issues and neccesary workarounds for all of their users to be able to launch.   
We want to be able to capture new Pirate users with our ease of use by having our gangplank down while docked vs. having to take a 4 hour CLI class to send your money and catch that swim ladder as the boat goes sailing by.
